remarks: The trace of a lattice translation is less than the fiducial co-atom ` W ` .  (Contributed by NM, 25-May-2012.)
statement:
trlle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
trlle.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trlle.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlle.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlle $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T ) -> ( R ` F ) .<_ W ) $.
